file.name: Contentful-UserManagementAPI.openapi_collection.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: User Management API
  description:  >-
      Contentful's User Management API helps organizations programmatically manage their organizations, organization memberships, teams, space memberships and more.
  
      
      Disclaimer: The User Management API is available for Enterprise customers on current pricing plans.

  version: 1.0.0
externalDocs:
  url: https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/user-management-api/
servers:
  - url: https://api.contentful.com
components:
  securitySchemes:
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
tags:
  - name: Organization Memberships
  - name: Invitations
  - name: Teams
  - name: Team membership
  - name: Space Memberships
  - name: Team Space Memberships
  - name: Space Members
  - name: Space Roles
  - name: Users
paths:
  /organizations/{organization_id}/organization_memberships:
    get:
      tags:
        - Organization Memberships
      summary: Get all organization memberships
      description: >-
        https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/user-management-api/#/reference/organization-memberships
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/scim+json
        - name: query
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          description: >-
            OPTIONAL - Specify a string to search for matching resources
            against. Fields searched: sys.user.id, sys.user.firstName,
            sys.user.lastName, sys.user.email
          example: rodrigo.contentful
        - name: skip
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: OPTIONAL - Specify requested page of result set
        - name: limit
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: OPTIONAL - Specify requested page of result set
        - name: order
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: >-
            OPTIONAL - Supported values: role, sys.createdAt, sys.lastActiveAt,
            sys.user.firstName, sys.user.lastName, sys.user.email
        - name: include
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: >-
            OPTIONAL - Specify linked resources to include in response.
            Supported values: sys.user, sys.createdBy, sys.updatedBy
        - name: organization_id
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json: {}
  /organizations/{organization_id}/organization_memberships/{organizationMembershipId}:
    get:
      tags:
        - Organization Memberships
      summary: Get a single organization membership
      description: >-
        https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/user-management-api/#/reference/organization-memberships
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/scim+json
        - name: organization_id
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
        - name: organizationMembershipId
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json: {}
    put:
      tags:
        - Organization Memberships
      summary: Organization membership
      description: >-
        https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/user-management-api/#/reference/organization-memberships
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              example:
                role: member
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/scim+json
        - name: organization_id
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
        - name: organizationMembershipId
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json: {}
    delete:
      tags:
        - Organization Memberships
      summary: Delete a single organization membership
      description: >-
        https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/user-management-api/#/reference/organization-memberships
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/scim+json
        - name: organization_id
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
        - name: organizationMembershipId
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json: {}
  /organizations/{organization_id}/invitations:
    post:
      tags:
        - Invitations
      summary: Create an invitation (alpha)
      description: >-
        https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/user-management-api/#/reference/invitations
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              example: ''
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/scim+json
        - name: organization_id
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json: {}
  /organizations/{organization_id}/invitations/{invitationId}:
    get:
      tags:
        - Invitations
      summary: Get a single invitation (alpha)
      description: >-
        https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/user-management-api/#/reference/invitations
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/scim+json
        - name: organization_id
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
        - name: invitationId
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json: {}
  /organizations/{spaceId}/teams:
    get:
      tags:
        - Teams
      summary: Get all teams for a space
      description: >-
        https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/user-management-api/#/reference/teams
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/scim+json
        - name: spaceId
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
        - name: skip
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: OPTIONAL - Specify requested page of result set
        - name: limit
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: OPTIONAL - Specify requested page of result set
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json: {}

    get:

        - name: organization_id

        - name: skip

          description: OPTIONAL - Specify requested page of result set
        - name: limit
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: OPTIONAL - Specify requested page of result set
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json: {}
    post:
      tags:
        - Teams
      summary: Create a team
      description: >-
        https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/user-management-api/#/reference/teams
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              example: ''
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/scim+json
        - name: organization_id
          in: path

          required: true
      responses:
        '200':

          content:

  /organizations/{organization_id}/teams/{teamId}:
    get:

        - name: organization_id

    delete:

        - name: organization_id

        - name: spaceId

        - name: Content-Type

          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/scim+json
        - name: include
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: OPTIONAL
          example: roles,sys.space,sys.createdBy
        - name: sys.user.sys.id
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: OPTIONAL
          example: 3lypMkmZdY6ZUbBTZMoXkS
        - name: organization_id
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
